comment.author: 14817343@N07
comment._content: The color is off,but this might be due to the materials available at the time, or because of deterioration over the years. The photographer did capture  a good pattern of repeating shapes, straight and curved. The composition as a whole is very pleasing to the eye.

comment.author: 7533073@N04
comment._content: The Library of Congress did not seem to take the time to color correct these old photos. But a few moments in Photoshop and you can see how truly beautiful and remarkable these photos were when they were taken.

comment.author: 24719865@N03
comment._content: I notice that the colors are a bit dark, but I still think that the essence of the pictures are still captured in their entirety.
